snippet: Alisa Weilerstein, the young cellist and recent recipient of a MacArthur Foundation grant, played Dvorak and Ives with her parents at Bargemusic.
lead_paragraph: Alisa Weilerstein, the young cellist and recent recipient of a MacArthur Foundation grant, played Dvorak and Ives with her parents at Bargemusic.

headline.main: A Concert, Nearly Canceled, Keeps a Rising Star Afloat
headline.print_headline: A Concert, Nearly Canceled, Keeps a Rising Star Afloat
headline.seo: Weilerstein Trio, With Alisa Weilerstein, at Bargemusic - Review
